original_text: tries to work in the same vein as the brilliance of animal house but instead comes closer to the failure of the third revenge of the nerds sequel .
generated_text:
1. "Tries to capture the magic of the original Ghostbusters but ends up feeling like a lazy rehash of the same old jokes."
2. "Seems to be attempting to recapture the wit and charm of Clueless but ultimately falls flat like a bad reboot."
3. "Pretends to be a worthy successor to the classic Fast and Furious franchise but instead feels like a soulless cash-grab."
4. "Tries to emulate the cleverness and humor of The Hangover but ends up being a dull and unfunny mess."
